page.title: 05Recreation in Maylandsea
page.content: There are numerous clubs in Maylandsea. In addition there are public tennis courts and a BMX cycle track on the playing field. The{Cirdan Trust}flotilla of a Baltic Trader, a Thames barge and a yacht is available for youth groups both inside and outside the area to hire. {Sailing,}is a major recreation and the creeks are used for swimming,in the abscence of an indoor pool in the area, and water skiing. Fishing for sea fish, cockles and winkles is also a pastime. {Riding}is popular and there are riding events held at Nipsells Farm. Many villagers keep their own horses. All houses have well tended{gardens indicating that this is a popular hobby. {Motor cycle}scrambles held at Lawling Hall.
